animeDescription: 1. Akai Koudan Zillion: Emi Penguin's Diary (EMI♡PENGUIN'S DIARY)  Musical retrospective of the TV series with circumstantial commentaries by Emi and JJ.  2. Akai Koudan Zillion: J.J. vs. Ricks - Predestined Confrontation (JJ tai Ricks: Shukumei no Taiketsu)  3. Akai Koudan Zillion: Champ & Apple - Fantastic Memories (チャンプ&アップル FANTASTIC MEMORIES)
